visual_style: Japanese anime style, 2D hand-drawn look with clean line art, vibrant cel shading, and expressive character design. Large detailed eyes, stylized hair with dynamic flow, and exaggerated emotional expressions. Smooth frame-by-frame motion inspired by classic and modern anime studios. Backgrounds richly painted with anime aesthetics: soft gradients, dramatic skies, detailed cityscapes, or natural landscapes. Cinematic composition, atmospheric lighting, and artistic color grading. Style reference: Makoto Shinkai films (Your Name, Weathering With You), Studio Ghibli. NOT 3D, NOT CGI, NOT photorealistic, NOT live-action. Aspect ratio 16:9 full frame, no borders, no black bars.
